K10D0180_H0181:426a-24: sangs rgyas nam yang yod pa ma yin pa //

K10D0180_H0181:426b-7: sgyu 'drar chos nyid gang gis shes gyur pa //

K10D0180_H0181:426b-19: de la tshul khrims 'chal med tshul khrims med; ;de ltar shes na de ni mgon por 'gyur //
K10D0180_H0181:426b-20: sgra yi rang bzhin yongs su mi shes pas //

K10D0180_H0181:427a-2: de dag byang chub kun nas khebs par gnas //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-3: spyod lam dag dang 'khrul la chags gyur cing //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-4: tshig dang smra la dga' zhing mi mkhas te //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-5: chos kyi rang bzhin yongs su ma shes na //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-6: tshig gi dag pas byang chub 'tshang mi rgya //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-7: stong nyid chos dag yongs su rjod byed cing //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-8: rtsod la dga' zhing 'thab bas sdang ba'i sems //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-9: sdom med ngan sems byed pa de dag la //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-10: sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub ga la yod //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-11: ngan sems bzod gnyis tshul gcig rang bzhin zhes //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-12: de ltar shes par byas shing khro ba spang //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-13: sems can rang bzhin yongs su mi shes pas //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-14: byis pa'i blo can khro ba skyed par byed //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-15: sems can thams cad bdag la dben pa ste //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-16: rgyal ba sems can 'grel 'gyur smon ces zer //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-17: de dag glengs pa tsam gyis khror 'gyur zhing //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-18: zhe sdang 'chang bas de dag tshig mi ster //
K10D0180_H0181:427a-19: 'thab la dga' zhing nyes pa 'tshol byed la //

K10D0180_H0181:427a-21: chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid ces smra //

K10D0180_H0181:427b-0: sems can mang pos @427b yongs su dgrol zhes zer //

K10D0180_H0181:427b-2: 'jig rten kun la phan sems de bzhin te //

K10D0180_H0181:427b-5: 'tshe ba snying rje gcig tu 'dus pa ni //

K10D0180_H0181:427b-11: bzod pa dam pa yongs su ma bsgoms par //
K10D0180_H0181:427b-12: rgyal ba de dag zhing du de mi 'gro /

K10D0180_H0181:427b-14: zhing rnams thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin zhes //
K10D0180_H0181:427b-15: zhing gi yon tan rlom sems gang med pa //
K10D0180_H0181:427b-16: skyes bu khyu mchog zhing du de 'gro'o //
K10D0180_H0181:427b-17: thams cad nyes byas bdag gis bzod par bya //
K10D0180_H0181:427b-18: rgyal ba'i sras la ston par sems zhes smra //
K10D0180_H0181:427b-19: ston pa'i 'du shes can la khro yod pa //

K10D0180_H0181:427b-21: bslang ba'i grong dang mdza' ba'i grong chags shing //
K10D0180_H0181:427b-22: gcig la gcig ni spyod pa sun yang 'byin //
K10D0180_H0181:427b-23: 'di ni bdag gis smin bya'i skal yin gyi //

K10D0180_H0181:427b-28: de la don du 'gyur ba gang yang med //
K10D0180_H0181:428a-1: gsum mtshan yang de bzhin te //

K10D0180_H0181:428a-3: de dag 'khrul pa gang la'ang brtag mi bya //

K10D0180_H0181:428a-5: 'dod pa'i yon tan dga' bar spyod mthong na //
K10D0180_H0181:428a-6: de yi 'khrul pa gang yang brtag mi bya //
K10D0180_H0181:428a-7: byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas yon tan gyis //
K10D0180_H0181:428a-8: de yang ma 'ongs dus na byang chub 'thob //

K10D0180_H0181:428b-11: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa //

K10D0180_H0181:428b-16: bskal pa bye ba mang bor phul ba bas //

K10D0180_H0181:428b-18: de la bsod nams grangs med 'phel bar 'gyur //
K10D0180_H0181:428b-19: byang chub don gnyer 'di la rab byung ba //

K10D0180_H0181:428b-27: so so yang dag rig kyang myur du 'thob //
K10D0180_H0181:429a-2: rnam pa mang por mdo sde mang po ston //

K10D0180_H0181:429b-23: kyi drung du / chos thams cad ni tshul gcig
K10D0180_H0181:429b-24: pa'o zhes bya bar khong du chud par gyur nas
K10D0180_H0181:429b-25: kyi drung du / / de'i 'og tu ngas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //

K10D0180_H0181:429b-28: chos bstan pa 'di thos par mtshungs te /
K10D0180_H0181:430a-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
K10D0180_H0181:430a-2: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par
K10D0180_H0181:430a-3: 'gyur pa ngas bshad do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na

K10D0180_H0181:430a-11: kyi tshul 'di ma shes na dge ba'i rtsa ba
K10D0180_H0181:430a-12: de dag thams cad phyir zad par 'gyur ro //
K10D0180_H0181:430a-14: lhas byin dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa la ltos //
K10D0180_H0181:430a-16: lhas byin ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu dang ldan par gyur to //
K10D0180_H0181:430a-17: de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa de'ang chos kyi tshul 'di ma shes pas /
